author: pburba
msg: On the 1.5.x-r36613 branch: Merge r36613 from trunk.
Replace SVN_ERR_ASSERT's with asserts, the former are not available in 1.5.x.

author: pburba
msg: Create a backport branch for r36613 group.

author: gstein
msg: You'd think some sanity might exist SOMEWHERE in libsvn_wc. Apparently
not, as this latest oddity really takes the cake.
Refine how we set the COPIED flag for schedule-delete nodes. We don't want
to set it if we have the changed_* information for a node. Why? Pfft. Why
ask why?
This keeps copy_tests 24 and schedule_tests 10 working (the driving force
behind the recent work here). But also fixes the became-broken tests of
update_tests 54 and switch_tests 31. Sigh.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/entries.c:
(read_entries): if cmt_rev is valid (aka changed_rev in the new world),
then we do NOT want to set the copied flag.

author: pburba
msg: * STATUS: Nominate r36613 and r36631.

author: gstein
msg: Add then delete should remove nodes from version control, true. But I
forget the delete-then-add scenario. It is entirely possibly to have a
deleted subtree with added parents.
Instead of aborting, just note that parents that are a simple add means no
copy has occured, so we can exit the scan.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/entries.c:
(read_entries): break out of the scanning loop rather than aborting when
we see an added ancestor of a deleted node.
